channel.title: CVE Feed for Moodle -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moodle -- all products

item.title: CVE-2012-1155|2024-08-06T18:53:35.521Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle has a database activity export permission issue where the export function of the database activity module exports all entries even those from groups the user does not belong to

item.title: CVE-2012-1169|2024-08-06T18:53:35.717Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has Personal information disclosure, when administrative setting users name display is set to first name only full names are shown in page breadcrumbs.

item.title: CVE-2012-1168|2024-08-06T18:53:35.678Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has a password and web services issue where when the user profile is updated the user password is reset if not specified.

item.title: CVE-2012-1158|2024-08-06T18:53:35.435Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has a course information leak in gradebook where users are able to see hidden grade items in export

item.title: CVE-2012-1161|2024-08-06T18:53:35.446Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2: Course information leak via hidden courses being displayed in tag search results

item.title: CVE-2012-1160|2024-08-06T18:53:35.447Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has a permission issue in Forum Subscriptions where unenrolled users can subscribe/unsubscribe via mod/forum/index.php

item.title: CVE-2012-1157|2024-08-06T18:53:35.447Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has a default repository capabilities issue where all repositories are viewable by all users by default

item.title: CVE-2012-1170|2024-08-06T18:53:36.290Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has an external enrolment plugin context check issue where capability checks are not thorough

item.title: CVE-2012-1159|2024-08-06T18:53:35.576Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2: Overview report allows users to see hidden courses

item.title: CVE-2012-1156|2024-08-06T18:53:35.446Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Moodle before 2.2.2 has users' private files included in course backups

item.title: CVE-2024-38277|2024-08-02T04:04:25.111Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: A unique key should be generated for a user's QR login key and their auto-login key, so the same key cannot be used interchangeably between the two.

item.title: CVE-2024-38273|2024-08-02T04:04:25.071Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Insufficient capability checks meant it was possible for users to gain access to BigBlueButton join URLs they did not have permission to access.

item.title: CVE-2024-38275|2024-08-02T04:04:25.068Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: The cURL wrapper in Moodle retained the original request headers when following redirects, so HTTP authorization header information could be unintentionally sent in requests to redirect URLs.

item.title: CVE-2024-38276|2024-08-02T04:04:25.194Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Incorrect CSRF token checks resulted in multiple CSRF risks.

item.title: CVE-2024-38274|2024-08-02T04:04:25.281Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Insufficient escaping of calendar event titles resulted in a stored XSS risk in the event deletion prompt.

item.title: CVE-2024-1439|2024-08-01T18:40:21.074Z -- moodle -- lms
item.description: Inadequate access control in Moodle LMS. This vulnerability could allow a local user with a student role to create arbitrary events intended for users with higher roles. It could also allow the attacker to add events to the calendar of all users without their prior consent.

item.title: CVE-2024-38275|2024-07-02T19:52:54.464Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: The cURL wrapper in Moodle retained the original request headers when following redirects, so HTTP authorization header information could be unintentionally sent in requests to redirect URLs.

item.title: CVE-2024-38277|2024-06-21T15:55:25.105Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: A unique key should be generated for a user's QR login key and their auto-login key, so the same key cannot be used interchangeably between the two.

item.title: CVE-2024-38273|2024-06-18T19:49:02.639Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Insufficient capability checks meant it was possible for users to gain access to BigBlueButton join URLs they did not have permission to access.

item.title: CVE-2024-38275|2024-06-18T19:49:26.986Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: The cURL wrapper in Moodle retained the original request headers when following redirects, so HTTP authorization header information could be unintentionally sent in requests to redirect URLs.

item.title: CVE-2024-38274|2024-06-18T19:49:15.739Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Insufficient escaping of calendar event titles resulted in a stored XSS risk in the event deletion prompt.

item.title: CVE-2024-38276|2024-06-18T19:49:40.339Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Incorrect CSRF token checks resulted in multiple CSRF risks.

item.title: CVE-2024-38277|2024-06-18T19:49:52.092Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: A unique key should be generated for a user's QR login key and their auto-login key, so the same key cannot be used interchangeably between the two.

item.title: CVE-2024-33996|2024-06-04T17:43:56.027Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Incorrect validation of allowed event types in a calendar web service made it possible for some users to create events with types/audiences they did not have permission to publish to.

item.title: CVE-2024-1439|2024-06-04T18:00:52.417Z -- moodle -- lms
item.description: Inadequate access control in Moodle LMS. This vulnerability could allow a local user with a student role to create arbitrary events intended for users with higher roles. It could also allow the attacker to add events to the calendar of all users without their prior consent.

item.title: CVE-2024-38273|2024-06-20T18:54:46.046Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Insufficient capability checks meant it was possible for users to gain access to BigBlueButton join URLs they did not have permission to access.

item.title: CVE-2024-38276|2024-06-25T17:33:46.654Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Incorrect CSRF token checks resulted in multiple CSRF risks.

item.title: CVE-2024-38274|2024-07-15T18:37:09.404Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Insufficient escaping of calendar event titles resulted in a stored XSS risk in the event deletion prompt.

item.title: CVE-2024-33996|2024-08-02T02:42:59.873Z -- moodle -- moodle
item.description: Incorrect validation of allowed event types in a calendar web service made it possible for some users to create events with types/audiences they did not have permission to publish to.
